metadata.description: A curated collection of development workflow plugins for code quality, testing, and documentation

plugins.name: dev
plugins.description: Streamlined development workflow with code quality checks, testing assistance, documentation generation, and intelligent refactoring support

plugins.name: playwright-tests
plugins.description: Orchestrated multi-agent system for fixing Playwright test failures in parallel. Includes 1 orchestrator + 5 specialized sub-agents for 5x faster debugging.
